about_the_game:
DriftGuard: Gamepad Maintenance Tool

Elevate Your Gaming Experience

Take control of your gaming sessions with DriftGuard, the ultimate tool for passionate gamers! Whether you're deep into competitive matches or casual play, DriftGuard ensures your game controllers, including PS4 and PS5 models, perform at their peak.

Key Features

Device Compatibility
Effortlessly connect original controllers via USB. Supported devices include PS4 (all revisions), PS5, and PS5 Edge (limited).
Note: Xbox controllers have restricted functionality—only button testing is available, as calibration is unsupported.

On-the-Fly Calibration
Maintain a seamless gaming experience by connecting via USB while your controller stays linked to your console via Bluetooth. Calibrate in real-time without interruptions.

Real-Time Analytics
Get precise feedback on analog stick movements to detect and address drift issues promptly.

Advanced Calibration
Optimize your controller’s responsiveness with advanced options tailored to supported models.

User-Centric Interface

Interactive Visuals
Monitor analog stick performance through intuitive, real-time graphics.

Event Logging
Track adjustments and key events with an in-built, easy-to-navigate log.

Effortless Setup
DriftGuard seamlessly integrates with your PC, offering automatic controller recognition and real-time diagnostics for issues like stick drift.

Purpose-Built Performance

DriftGuard is engineered to eliminate light stick drift without requiring potentiometer replacements. It also simplifies calibration after upgrades to Hall effect analog sticks.

Note: Xbox controllers have limited functionality with the app. Calibration isn’t supported, but button testing works flawlessly.

Take control and elevate your gameplay today with DriftGuard!
